nml_option.name: config_dam_break_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in dam_break case. Default value is 1.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_dam_break_eta0
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.

nml_option.name: config_dam_break_dc
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than zero.

nml_option.name: config_dam_break_Xl
nml_option.description: The length of dam along the X-direction.
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than or equal to zero.

nml_option.name: config_dam_break_Yl
nml_option.description: The length of dam along the Y-direction.
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than or equal to zero.

nml_option.name: config_dam_break_Inlet
nml_option.possible_values: Any real number larger than or equal to zero.
